title: Funny Martial Arts T-Shirt - Kick In Range Tee - White Ink
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

If You Can Read This You Are In Range Shirt is a clever and funny design for the martial artist with a sense of humor. Let people know that at any time you can high kick, roundhouse, reverse roundhouse, back kick, axe kick, back kick or flying back kick.

Whether you love Karate, Taekwondo, Muay Thai, Capoeira, Kickboxing, Kung Fu, Aikido, Eskrima, or any MMA or Mixed Martial Arts, you'll at least understand the halarious natuire of this tee. Great present for any trained fighter of any style and culture.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: Great gift for friends or family that love martial arts and can defend themselves. Also available in white ink on darker apparel.
